column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.
GOLDSTAR SPOTTY (3) - tightened into bend losing ground and hampering the trailing SONJA.
MITCHAM PRU (4) - contacted by OPA'S MATE early stages. Checked outwards off heels home turn checking OPA'S MATE.
SONJA (5) - badly tightened by OPA'S MATE early stages dropping to rear. Hampered on bend and dropped to rear as GOLDSTAR SPOTTY lost ground. Raced very wide home turn.
OPA'S MATE (6) - ran inwards early stages tightening SONJA and contacting MITCHAM PRU. Checked by MITCHAM PRU home turn losing ground.
JADED AFFAIR (7) - pushed outwards back straight.
FLORA DORA (1) - contacted by BLACK TORI into bend then got on heels soon after.
SMASH GRENADE (2) - checked outwards on bend pushing runners wide.
ALEXIA (3) - held up on bend losing momentum.
STARR BLUEBLOOD (4) - badly checked and pushed wide on bend losing ground. Had heels clipped by TEARAWAY TARA home turn when well back. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
BLACK TORI (5) - ran inwards into bend contacting FLORA DORA then had heels clipped losing momentum.
TEARAWAY TARA (7) - badly checked on bend losing chance. Got on heels of STARR BLUEBLOOD home turn when well back.
EYREWELL BENTLEY (8) - badly checked on bend losing chance.
LAKOTA KOHANA (1) - slow to jump. Checked by RING CLOWN into bend losing ground.
RING CLOWN (3) - checked by outside runners early stages. Pushed down track into bend checking LAKOTA KAHUNA. Ran wide home turn. Fell at lure. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
OPAWA DI (4) - contacted by outside runners early stages.
OPHIRA BALE (5) - slow to jump. Hampered into bend as RING CLOWN was pushed down the track.

MAN OF LETTERS (6) - checked by IT'S A JOKE early stages losing ground. Got on heels on bend losing ground. Ran wide home straight. Fell at lure. Assessed by vet and found to have ileopsoas muscle soreness.
IT'S A JOKE (7) - ran inwards early stages checking inside runners. Fell at lure. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
TWO BE FRANK (1) - ran inwards early stages of run home checking NEELIX.
PUNCH ON SCOOBY (4) - checked by outside runners early stages. Ran outwards into bend checking JAX JEWEL. Again ran outwards home turn contacting JAX JEWEL.
NEELIX (5) - checked by TWO BE FRANK early in run home and switched wide in consequence.
JAX JEWEL (6) - checked by outside runners early stages. Checked by PUNCH ON SCOOBY back straight and pushed wide. Again contacted by PUNCH ON SCOOBY home turn.
KEA VIKING (7) - checked by GOLDSTAR DODGE early stages.
GOLDSTAR DODGE (8) - ran inwards early stages checking KEA VIKING and JAX JEWEL. Shortened stride into bend finishing a distant last. Assessed by vet and found to have hock soreness.
SHAW LEE (1) - checked outwards off heels of BECK ELEVEN on bend and pushed PITA RAMOS wider on the track in consequence.
GOLDSTAR MAJOR (2) - tightened in back straight dropping to rear.
OUR DAZZEL (4) - contacted HANKENSTEIN early stages. Ran outwards on bend.
HANKENSTEIN (5) - contacted OUR DAZZEL early stages. Ran very wide around bend.
BECK ELEVEN (6) - had heels clipped on bend.
PITA RAMOS (7) - pushed outwards on bend by SHAW LEE.
EPIC ROSE (2) - tightened into bend and forced outwards in consequence. Checked by BELFAST DEMO on bend losing ground.
MACHINE GUNN (3) - ran outwards early stages. Checked into bend as KNOW SWEAT ran inwards.

BELFAST DEMO (4) - badly tightened early stages losing ground. Checked into bend as KNOW SWEAT continued to run inwards. Ran outwards off the heels of REIGN OF FIRE on bend checking KNOW SWEAT and EPIC ROSE.
KNOW SWEAT (5) - ran inwards early stages. Continued to run inwards into bend checking BELFAST DEMO and MACHINE GUNN. Checked by BELFAST DEMO on bend losing ground.
REIGN OF FIRE (6) - ran very wide home straight.
ULYSSA BALE (C Roberts) was a late scratching at kenneling when found to be in season.
OPAWA OSCAR (2) - badly tightened into bend and dragged down for a stride running outwards in consequence. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
HOMEBUSH ALEXEI (3) - ran wide home turn.
FIRED UP JED (4) - forced down track in back straight and tightened losing ground. Checked and pushed very wide into bend losing chance. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
FOREHAND RAID (8) - last on settling. Hampered into bend losing momentum.
OPAWA MAY (2) - brushed with BAHAMA QUEEN on first bend when improving to its inside.
DYNA VARSITY (4) - pushed wide first bend.
BAHAMA QUEEN (6) - brushed by OPAWA MAY on first turn when that runner improved on its inside. Tightened soon after losing ground.
AVENGER BALE (7) - ran wide first bend.
KNOW REFUSAL (8) - last to jump. Raced wide first bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: I Pave Shirley Boys Syndicate

column1: MAX DANCER (J & D Fahey) was a late scratching at kenneling when found to be in season.
JOE BONANZA (2) - checked outwards off heels of GOLDSTAR SPOCK into first bend and then pushed very wide losing ground.
KNOW BETRAYAL (3) - contacted CREME BRULEE early stages. Ran outwards first bend badly checking JOE BONANZA.
CREME BRULEE (5) - contacted KNOW BETRAYAL early stages. Checked by JOE BONANZA first bend losing ground.
OPHELIA ALLEN (7) - checked by JOE BONANZA first bend losing ground.
DISOBEDIENCE (1) - contacted by OUR ANNA into bend when that runner faltered.
OUR ANNA (2) - ran outwards in back straight then faltered and dropped away. Assessed by vet and found to have a triceps injury.
SPECIAL AS (3) - ran outwards back straight causing tightening to outside runners.
KNOW CHARISMA (4) - tightened back straight losing ground. Raced wide home turn.
KING TOLIMAN (5) - tightened back straight losing ground.
SOZIN'S AZURE (6) - tightened back straight losing ground.
CHITINA TIN (7) - tightened back straight losing ground.
ELODEA (8) - ran inwards back straight causing tightening to inside runners.
CULVIE NESS (2) - contacted by outside runners into bend losing momentum.
GOLDEN BAY (3) - contacted by HOMEBUSH CAESAR in back straight.
HILTON FORABET (4) - ran wide home turn.
HOMEBUSH CAESAR (5) - contacted GOLDEN BAY in back straight.
GO GUNNA (6) - ran wide home turn.

column5: Owned/Raced by: A Bradshaw & P Seque

column1: CHANYAKA (2) - checked by SMASH DAMAGE in back straight losing ground.
SMASH DAMAGE (3) - contacted by KNOW BABY in back straight then checked CHANYAKA losing ground.
KNOW BABY (4) - checked by KNOW BABY in back straight and then contacted SMASH DAMAGE.
JINJA ELLIE (5) - ran inwards back straight checking KNOW BABY. Ran wide on bend.
LITTLE KRAKATOA (6) - ran wide on bend.
The official website for Greyhound Racing New Zealand (GRNZ)
